item.title: Pisco sour
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml pisco 30 ml lime juice 15 ml sugar syrup 1/2 egg white aromatic bitters lime slice Instructions Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.
